main event: A bright white light, larger than a star but smaller than a plane, was spotted in the sky over La Puente, California.
interesting points: The object appeared in the west and disappeared to the west, traveling in a straight line at a slightly ascending angle.
The object was visible for 5-10 seconds before shooting straight up and out of sight at a terrific rate of speed.
The object had a gray color and appeared to be disc-shaped, hovering over an area for 5-10 seconds.
There was a light hue or glow on both sides of the object.
No sound was heard from the object.
sighted object: a bright white light, larger than a star but smaller than a plane, with a gray, disc-shaped appearance
